abstract: The banking giant’s chief isn’t known for making good deals, but this one’s a killer.
snippet: The banking giant’s chief isn’t known for making good deals, but this one’s a killer.
lead_paragraph: Vikram Pandit isn’t known for his deal-making on behalf of Citigroup shareholders. Though he sold the bank his hedge fund, Old Lane, near the top of the market, the Citigroup chief executive was beaten by Wells Fargo in the battle for Wachovia two months ago. However, as further details emerge on Citi’s government bailout, Mr. Pandit seems to have pulled off a truly fantastic deal.

headline.main: Vikram Pandit Scores a Great Deal for Citigroup
headline.print_headline: Vikram Pandit's Great Deal for Citi
